Summarise Forecast Rts

summarise_forecast.Rd

Summarise Forecast Rts

summarise_forecast(fit_samples)

Arguments

fit_samples

A dataframe as produced by EpiSoon::forecast.

Value

A summarised dataframe.

Examples



samples <- forecast_rt(example_obs_rts,
                       model = function(...) {EpiSoon::bsts_model(model =
                    function(ss, y){bsts::AddSemilocalLinearTrend(ss, y = y)}, ...)},
                       horizon = 7, samples = 10)


summarise_forecast(samples)
#> # A tibble: 7 x 9
#>   date       horizon median  mean     sd bottom lower upper   top
#>   <date>       <int>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 2020-03-23       1   1.54  1.53 0.0224   1.50  1.54  1.55  1.55
#> 2 2020-03-24       2   1.48  1.47 0.0476   1.35  1.48  1.51  1.51
#> 3 2020-03-25       3   1.44  1.44 0.0613   1.29  1.42  1.46  1.51
#> 4 2020-03-26       4   1.41  1.39 0.0739   1.24  1.41  1.47  1.47
#> 5 2020-03-27       5   1.35  1.36 0.0615   1.24  1.30  1.38  1.45
#> 6 2020-03-28       6   1.33  1.30 0.0758   1.12  1.32  1.36  1.36
#> 7 2020-03-29       7   1.26  1.26 0.0831   1.09  1.21  1.29  1.38
